alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 11:53AM MST until November 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Light snow expected. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Lemhi Pass, Bannock Pass, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Shoup, and Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
